verses.kjv: Bless the LORD, O my soul: and all that is within me, bless his holy name.
verses.ct: Praise the LORD, my soul! With everything inside me, praise his holy name.

verses.kjv: Bless the LORD, O my soul, and forget not all his benefits:
verses.ct: Praise the LORD, my soul, and never forget all the good he has done for you:

verses.kjv: Who forgiveth all thine iniquities; who healeth all thy diseases;
verses.ct: He forgives every one of your sins; he heals every one of your diseases;

verses.kjv: Who redeemeth thy life from destruction; who crowneth thee with lovingkindness and tender mercies;
verses.ct: He rescues your life from the grave; he surrounds you with lovingkindness and tender mercy;

verses.kjv: Who satisfieth thy mouth with good things; so that thy youth is renewed like the eagle’s.
verses.ct: He fills your life with good things, so that your strength is restored like an eagle's.

verses.kjv: The LORD executeth righteousness and judgment for all that are oppressed.
verses.ct: The LORD brings righteousness and justice to everyone who is oppressed.

verses.kjv: He made known his ways unto Moses, his acts unto the children of Israel.
verses.ct: He revealed his ways to Moses and showed his mighty works to the people of Israel.

verses.kjv: The LORD is merciful and gracious, slow to anger, and plenteous in mercy.
verses.ct: The LORD is compassionate and gracious, patient and overflowing with mercy.

verses.kjv: He will not always chide: neither will he keep his anger for ever.
verses.ct: He won't accuse us forever, and he won't hold on to his anger endlessly.

verses.kjv: He hath not dealt with us after our sins; nor rewarded us according to our iniquities.
verses.ct: He has not treated us the way our sins deserve, and he has not repaid us for all our wrongs.

verses.kjv: For as the heaven is high above the earth, so great is his mercy toward them that fear him.
verses.ct: As high as the heavens stretch above the earth, that's how vast his mercy is toward those who deeply revere him.

verses.kjv: As far as the east is from the west, so far hath he removed our transgressions from us.
verses.ct: As far as the east is from the west — that's how far he has carried our sins away from us.

verses.kjv: Like as a father pitieth his children, so the LORD pitieth them that fear him.
verses.ct: Just as a father shows compassion to his children, the LORD shows compassion to those who deeply revere him.

verses.kjv: For he knoweth our frame; he remembereth that we are dust.
verses.ct: He understands how we are formed; he keeps in mind that we are made of dust.

verses.kjv: As for man, his days are as grass: as a flower of the field, so he flourisheth.
verses.ct: A person's days are like grass — they bloom like a wildflower,

verses.kjv: For the wind passeth over it, and it is gone; and the place thereof shall know it no more.
verses.ct: but when the wind sweeps over it, it vanishes, and the spot where it grew remembers it no longer.

verses.kjv: But the mercy of the LORD is from everlasting to everlasting upon them that fear him, and his righteousness unto children’s children;
verses.ct: But the mercy of the LORD stretches from eternity to eternity for those who deeply revere him, and his righteousness extends to their children's children —

verses.kjv: To such as keep his covenant, and to those that remember his commandments to do them.
verses.ct: to those who honor his covenant and who remember his commands and follow them.

verses.kjv: The LORD hath prepared his throne in the heavens; and his kingdom ruleth over all.
verses.ct: The LORD has established his throne in the heavens, and his kingdom rules over everything.

verses.kjv: Bless the LORD, ye his angels, that excel in strength, that do his commandments, hearkening unto the voice of his word.
verses.ct: Praise the LORD, you his angels — you mighty ones who carry out his commands, listening for the sound of his word.

verses.kjv: Bless ye the LORD, all ye his hosts; ye ministers of his, that do his pleasure.
verses.ct: Praise the LORD, all his heavenly armies — you servants of his who carry out his will.

verses.kjv: Bless the LORD, all his works in all places of his dominion: bless the LORD, O my soul.
verses.ct: Praise the LORD, all his works, in every place where he reigns. Praise the LORD, my soul!
